document.full_text: in mississippi, warnings about eagle lake caused an exodus. the 15 residents who remained gather daily at a bar called strick's for beer, burgers and, inevitably, talk about the levees.
document.title: a mississippi town's holdouts wait out the flood at the bar
lines_and_colors: in mississippi, warnings about eagle lake caused an exodus. the 15 residents who remained gather daily at a bar called strick's for beer, burgers and, inevitably, talk about the levees.
